description: New one-story Community Center co-located with the Lorton Library with new playground and fitness areas, walking trails and outdoor recreation.

display_name: Schneider Branch Segment 1 (CU82-0002) at Sully Road Stream Restoration
description: restoration of approximately 1,041 linear feet of stream using natural channel design and riparian corridor enhancements for improved water quality. This project is in the Sully Magisterial District of Fairfax County, Virginia.

Demolition of existing heliport and construction of replacement facility on existing site, 4604 West Ox Road, Fairfax, Virginia, including a 23,000 SF structure with helicopter landing area and maintenance bays, aircraft fuel station, offices, and site improvements.

display_name: Wiehle Avenue at Washington and Old Dominion Trail
description: Construction of a new 16â€™ wide bicycle/pedestrian overpass spanning approximately 143 LF over Wiehle Avenue to replace the existing at-grade crossing, approximately 175 LF gravity retaining wall, 1,100 LF Mechanically Stabilized Earth (MSE) retaining wall, approximately 2,200 LF, 10 FT and 12 FT wide asphalt trail, concrete sidewalk, curb and combination curb and gutter, curb ramps, detectable warning surfaces, storm drains, storm drain structures, water main relocation, signal works at the intersection of Wiehle Avenue and Sunset Hills Road, signage works, milling, paving, pavement marking and other associated works.
